inputs.prompt: An indoor scene features a lone man centered in the frame, standing still against a plain, softly lit off-white wall. The background is minimal and uncluttered, with smooth texture and no visible objects, creating a quiet, empty atmosphere. The man wears a dark gray hoodie layered over a shirt, the fabric slightly worn and natural. He looks directly toward the camera with a tense, focused expression—brows subtly furrowed, lips parted as if fighting the cold air in his lungs. His eyes appear serious and intent, reflecting a restrained emotion rather than overt panic. He begins to sing softly, <S>baby it’s cold outside.<E> holding the words with deliberate slowness, as if testing each breath. The stillness of the room amplifies his presence, the plain wall behind him emphasizing isolation and vulnerability. <AUDCAP>Clear, intimate male singing at close range, low and controlled, with faint room echo and subtle breathing between words, no music, no background noise.<ENDAUDCAP>
